content.text: Hey there! I'm a personal chef, and I'm looking for new opportunities. Do you have any food restrictions?
Hi! I'm not a big fan of sugar, but other than that I'm pretty open.
I'm glad to hear that! I've traveled to Asia and Europe to learn new cooking techniques and share my food with new people.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to travel to Europe.
It was an amazing experience. I've been to Italy, France, and Spain. I love learning about different cultures and trying new foods.
That's awesome! I'm not very adventurous when it comes to food.
I'm sure you'd love some of the dishes I've made. I'm especially proud of my pasta dishes.
I love pasta! What's your favorite type of pasta to make?
I love making ravioli. It's a lot of work, but it's so delicious.
That sounds really good! I've never had ravioli before.
You're missing out! It's one of my favorite dishes.
